pr_title: DPC-588 Feature: Changed successful token deletion response from 200 to 204.

timeline.message: Changed successful token deletion response from 200 to 204.

timeline.bodyText: @Sun-Mountain Will this require a coordinated change to APIClient.response_successful? and perhaps other changes?
timeline.author: dhgreene

replies.bodyText: Yes. At least in few places.
replies.author: Sun-Mountain

replies.bodyText: Should I make a ticket and start working on it?
replies.author: Sun-Mountain
